com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Class SmartCommands.ProgressGuardedCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartCommands.GuardedCommand<android.app.Activity>
      • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartCommands.ProgressGuardedCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SmartCommands.GuardedHandler, java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    SmartCommands

    public abstract static class SmartCommands.ProgressGuardedCommand
extends SmartCommands.GuardedCommand<android.app.Activity>
    Enables to execute in background a task, by notifying when the execution is running. It is especially useful when the UI should be notified when a command is running.

    When the command is executed by the SmartCommands.LOW_PRIORITY_THREAD_POOL, its underlying ProgressHandler is notified.

    Since:
    2010.11.30

      • SmartCommands.ProgressGuardedCommand

        public SmartCommands.ProgressGuardedCommand(android.app.Activity activity,
                                    java.lang.Object component,
                                    ProgressHandler progressHandler,
                                    java.lang.String message)
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity from which the execution originates, and which will be used when reporting a potential exception ; it is not allowed to be @{code null}
        component - the component from which the execution originates, and which will be used when reporting a potential exception ; may be @{code null}
        progressHandler - it will be invoked when the command starts, and when the command is over, even if an exception is thrown during the execution
        message - an optional message that will be passed to the ProgressHandler when the command starts
